backend/main.mo: Motoko actor storing contact form submissions in a map with functions to add, retrieve one, or list all.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented portfolio-image, project-data, and gallery-behavior features with their metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for numerous frontend components and pages.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment checklist outlining build, UI, routing, branding, and production identifier verification steps.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining global CSS variables for light/dark themes and applying background/foreground tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata, title, and mount point for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main router configuration defining all routes, including blog sub-pages, and rendering the RouterProvider.
frontend/src/components/blog/ArticleSide: Two-column layout component placing an article image on the left or right with object-contain rendering and error handling.
frontend/src/components/common/Container: Simple wrapper component providing consistent responsive horizontal padding and max‑width.
frontend/src/components/common/GradientB: Transparent structural wrapper maintaining spacing without applying gradient backgrounds.
Reusable card with optional icon, title, description, and customizable text class overrides.
frontend/src/components/common/MotionGra: Empty placeholder file for a removed animated background component.
frontend/src/components/common/OceanAnim: Empty placeholder file for a removed ocean animation background component.
frontend/src/components/common/ProfilePo: Circular portrait component with gradient glow, ring styling, and eager-loaded image asset.
frontend/src/components/common/RightSide: Empty placeholder file for a portrait component.
frontend/src/components/common/SectionCo: Empty placeholder file for a portrait component.
frontend/src/components/common/SectionMe: Empty placeholder file for a portrait component.
frontend/src/components/common/ShareSite: Displays the site's URL with copy-to-clipboard and external-link buttons.
frontend/src/components/common/StaticWat: Renders static background and overlay layers for the site.
frontend/src/components/common/Waterfall: Empty placeholder component for a video background.
frontend/src/components/contact/ContactF: Implements a validated contact form with submission handling and status display.
frontend/src/components/contact/SubmitSt: Shows success or error alerts after a contact form submission.
frontend/src/components/home/HeroSection: Hero banner with title, description, stats, and navigation buttons.
frontend/src/components/layout/HeaderNav: Responsive navigation header with desktop links and mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer with branding, quick links, contact prompt, and copyright.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Page layout combining header, footer, background, and routed content.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Projec: Category filter tabs for selecting project types.
Image gallery with navigation, thumbnails, and fallback handling for errors.
Renders a responsive grid of project cards with images, descriptions, links, and tool badges.
frontend/src/components/skills/SkillCate: Displays a skill category card with a title and a list of skills using SkillMeter components.
frontend/src/components/skills/SkillMete: Shows an individual skill label with a percentage and a progress bar.
frontend/src/components/skills/SkillsDet: Renders detailed skill sections with images, descriptions, and categorized bullet points, optionally with a heading.
frontend/src/data/blogArticles.ts: Defines the BlogArticle interface and provides structured blog article content with metadata and sections.
frontend/src/data/projects.ts: Defines project and image interfaces and exports a list of detailed project entries with tools and media.
frontend/src/data/skillsDetails.ts: Defines skill detail structures and provides categorized skill descriptions with images for multiple domains.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to user identity, refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: React hook that detects and updates whether the user prefers reduced motion using a media query listener.
Defines a React Query mutation that submits contact form data via an actor and invalidates related queries on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS styles, theme variables, dark mode settings, gradient utilities, and static background/typography overrides.
frontend/src/lib/assetPaths.ts: Utility functions for normalizing asset paths and providing a fallback image path.
frontend/src/lib/emailValidation.ts: Exports a simple email validation function using a regex.
frontend/src/lib/portrait.ts: Defines the portrait image path and alt text used across the site.
frontend/src/lib/seo.ts: Utility for setting page title and meta tags including Open Graph tags.
frontend/src/lib/siteUrl.ts: Computes the canonical site URL based on the current origin and base path.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React root, sets up QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, and renders the main App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with SEO setup, biography content, portrait, and skill highlight cards.
frontend/src/pages/blog/BlogDigitalMarke: Loads and displays the digital marketing blog article with SEO setup, image handling, and a side‑by‑side layout.
frontend/src/pages/blog/BlogGraphicDesig: Loads and renders the graphic design blog article using a side‑by‑side layout, including SEO and fallback image handling.
frontend/src/pages/blog/BlogLawLegalArti: Renders the law/legal blog article page, loading article data by slug, setting SEO, handling image fallback, and displaying intro, sections, and conclusion in a side‑by‑side layout.
frontend/src/pages/blog/BlogVideoEditing: Renders the video‑editing blog article page with SEO setup, image loading and fallback, and structured article content displayed in a side‑by‑side layout.
frontend/src/pages/blog/BlogWebDesignDev: Renders the web‑design/dev blog article page, configuring SEO, image fallback, and presenting article content using a right‑aligned image layout.
frontend/src/pages/BlogPage.tsx: Displays a grid of blog articles with image fallback handling, SEO setup, and links to individual posts.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders the contact page with SEO setup, a contact form, and contact details including email, location, and WhatsApp.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the home page hero section and sets SEO metadata for the main portfolio landing page.
frontend/src/pages/PortfolioPage.tsx: Shows a portfolio with category filtering, a projects grid, and detailed skills, with SEO initialization.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Lists professional services in a grid with icons and descriptions, along with SEO setup and a CTA section.
frontend/src/pages/SkillsPage.tsx: Displays a detailed skills section with SEO configuration and a styled header.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config extending colors, layout, animations, fonts, and enabling plugins like typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Tracks project version, requirements, architectural notes, open issues, and image needs for the site rebuild and theme updates.
